Secondary objective 1 ) investigate treatment 's ability reduce degree ) quality life b ) function c ) insomnia fatigue ) pain-related fear negative thought e ) depression anxiety , cost-effectiveness treatment ; 2 ) study variable could moderate/mediate treatment outcome , ) degree covert avoidance , b ) degree reactivity inner sensation Trial Design : Randomized control trial waitlist control , also receive treatment first group finish . Duration : Ten week Primary Endpoint : Change Fibromyalgia symptom impact baseline Week 10 . Long term follow-up also investigate ( potential change post-treatment 6- 12 month treatment completion ) Efficacy Parameters : Fibromyalgia Impact Questionnaire ( FIQ ) Description Trial Subjects : Patients > 18 year old , Fibromyalgia diagnosis , reside Sweden . Number Subjects : 140 Sample size estimation : Sample size base estimate effect size ( measure Cohen 's ) 0.5 , base power 0.8 room 10 % dropout rate . Recruitment : Self-referral . Advertising make national newspaper , social medium patient organisation ' website . Safety parameter : Participants opportunity report adverse event treatment posttreatment follow-up measurement . Data collection : Data collect electronically via treatment platform . Plan miss data : Last-observation carry forward ( LOCF ) . Main statistical analysis : Hierarchical linear mixed modelling .
